introduction: SYNOPSISSeong-min and Dong-su are ex-convicts who are released after serving 20 years in prison. They find what work they can do but see it impossible to hold down jobs. So-young has waited 20 years for Seong-min and has been running an orphanage. After Seong-min returns to her, he learns that Du-sam, his partner in crime who betrayed him is the chairman of the company that bought the orphanage to build a resort town. So-young tries to calm Seong-min who is outraged but Du-sam tries to cover his tracks by devising a scheme. Dong-su, who lives with fashion model Hye-ja, whom he saved from an assault, finds Du-sam and throw him a powerful punch of justices.故事晟敏从20年的12个世界踢和相同数量之前，不会忍受只要guhana他们的具体工作难的进口。本苗圃行动和意志搁在她的怀里长达20年的等待这么年轻投入神圣的人都知道两个杉集团的同谋总裁的育苗场休闲镇，然后卖给既定计划为大型团体背叛旧的自己。当愤怒被吹灭时，两个灵魂密谋隐藏自己的过去。住在她家里的家伙在救援被攻击的惠耶赫的模样的帮助下，两次华丽地拜访了一些背叛的惩罚。
